objectives.objective: Ingest existing scan outputs to build a canonical catalog of visual attributes keyed by report, page, visual, and attribute
Compare Rainwater Theme v4.1 to the catalog to identify overlap, gaps, and conflicts
Update the theme so every key that contains the word font uses Calibri while preserving all non font keys and values

assumptions.assumption: Scan outputs already exist in the repo

steps.step: Load visual-properties.csv and normalize to a catalog with report, page, visual, attribute_family, attribute_key, attribute_value, source_path
Cross check against repo_inventory.json to ensure each pbip reference is accounted for
Produce a one page summary grouped by visual type and attribute family

acceptance.criterion: All pbip visuals referenced are present with source file paths
No orphan attributes without a source reference

steps.step: Parse the theme JSON and flatten JSON Pointer paths with keys and values
Join flattened theme keys to catalog attribute keys using case insensitive matching and common synonyms
Compute per family counts of matches, partials, and misses
Generate a diff report with JSON Pointers for reproducibility

acceptance.criterion: Each diff entry includes file path and JSON Pointer
Executive summary provides at least five recommendations

steps.step: Traverse all objects and arrays; for each key where the name contains 'font' set the value to 'Calibri' if it is a string
Do not change sizes or any non font keys
Emit a change log with path, json_pointer, key, old_value, new_value, note
Verify all keys containing 'font' equal 'Calibri' and all non font keys are byte identical

acceptance.criterion: Verification report documents checks performed and results

constraints.constraint: Read only for inputs except new outputs
Case insensitive match for key names that include 'font'
Ignore values that include the word 'font' unless the key also includes 'font'
Preserve encoding and newline style of the original theme

tools.tool: Flatten JSON with JSON Pointer paths

successCriteria.criterion: Reproducible pipeline from inputs to outputs with clear logs
Summaries and diffs suitable for review in under five minutes
